item.title: Cheap Used Cell Phones For Sale
item.description:
Need a new cell phone but dread dealing with carriers and contracts? You’re not alone. Carrier stores are notorious for expensive phones and restrictive contracts. They might offer a “cheap” phone, but it comes with strings attached â€“ usually a pricey new contract and limited model options. If you haven’t been with your carrier long enough for an upgrade or prefer not to sign a new contract, carriers will charge full retail price for a new phone...
